duties_responsibilities.duty: Improve EH&S performance by promoting an incident-free workplace, identifying and mitigating safety risks, and implementing safety programs.
Lead safety incident investigations, work with key stakeholders to develop root cause analysis, and identify corrective actions.
Conduct compliance audits and guide teams with implementing corrective actions to ensure compliance.
Conduct risk assessments such as hazard assessments, ergonomic assessments, etc.
Lead project management and coordination of actions which drive continuous improvement.
Create Toolbox Talks and presentations and effectively deliver to operational teams.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Environmental/Occupational Health & Safety or related field of study, or equivalent experience. Master’s degree is a plus.
